data.title: PraWho Is Vasundhara Kashyap? Biography Of Vasundhara Kashyapthana Nathan
data.meta_description: Vasundhara Kashyap is a multi-talented Indian actress and model who has made a name for herself in the entertainment industry.
data.text:
Vasundhara Kashyap is a multi-talented Indian actress and model who has made a name for herself in the entertainment industry. She is widely recognized for her remarkable performances in Tamil movies such as Jayamkondaan, Poraali, andalaikkoothal. In addition to her acting career, Kashyap is also a well-known fashion model who has earned accolades for her captivating runway appearances. Her impressive talent and versatility have earned her numerous fans and admirers, cementing her status as a rising star in the Indian entertainment world.

Who’s Vasundhara Kashyap?

Vasundhara Kashyap is an acclaimed model and actress from India, renowned for her exceptional performances in numerous Tamil films such as Jayamkondaan (2008), Poraali (2011), and Thalaikkoothal (2023). In addition to her career in acting, she has also made a name for herself as a fashion model and was awarded the Miss Creativity title at the Miss Chennai Beauty Pageant.

Does Vasundhara – Kashyap consume alcohol? Yes

Biography of Vasundhara Kashyap

Vasundhara was born on August 19, 1989 and grew up with her siblings in New Delhi. She attended a local high school for her primary education, and later earned her bachelor’s degree from a prestigious university. During her time in college, Vasundhara competed in the Miss Chennai Beauty Pageant and won the title of Miss Creativity.

How old is Vasundhara Kashyap?

Based on Vasundhara – Kashyap’s date of birth, she is currently 34 years old in 2023.

Vasundhara Kashyap Height and Weight

The height of Vasundhara – Kashyap is about 5′ 7″, and her weight is approximately 55 kg.

Films and Web Series by Vasundhara Kashyap

Having gained initial fame as a model, Vasundhara embarked on her acting career in 2007 with a guest appearance in Jeeva’s drama film, “Unnale Unnale.” A year later, she a role as Poonkodai, a supporting character in R. Kannan’s commercially successful action-romantic movie “Jayam Kondaan.”

In 2011, Vasundhara received recognition for her outstanding performance as Maari in Samuthirakani’s drama-thriller movie “Poraali.” Her performance was widely acclaimed, and she was even nominated for the 2012 Vijay Awards for best supporting actress. She has also had leading roles in various other movies and short films, including “Thenmerku Paruvakaatru” (2010), “Tuneega Tuneega” (2012), “Kanne Kalaimaane” (2019), “Bakrid” (2019), and the upcoming “Kannai Nambathey” (2023).

In her latest project, Vasundhara played the crucial character of Vaijayanthi in the Amazon Prime anthology drama series “Modern Love Chennai,” alongside Wamiqa Gabbi, Ritu Varma, and Sri Gouri Priya in pivotal roles.

Vasundhara Kashyap’s income

Vasundhara Kashyap’s current net worth is estimated to be between Rs. 5-8 crore, with her main sources of income being from acting, modeling, commercials, brand endorsements and advertisements.

At present, Vasundhara has not discussed or made public any information about her past or present relationships. If we discover any details about her personal life, we will promptly update you.

Vasundhara Kashyap is originally from New Delhi, India and is a well-known model and actress.

She is an enthusiastic animal lover and has a pet dog and cat.

Her interests include singing, dancing, reading books, cycling, painting, playing the guitar.

In 2012, she was nominated for the prestigious Vijay Award for being the best supporting actress.

Additionally, she relishes Japanese, Chinese, and Indian delicacies.

Prathana Nathan has collaborated with she on several projects such as “Modern Love Chennai” and various films and shows”.
